Now a plane that has made more than 12,000 trips around the world touches down on the tarmac for the last time. With 6 million parts and 73 tons of material, it is the biggest breakdown job the team has ever faced. The Phantom F-4 is one of the most accurate and lethal fighter jets in the world-and breaking one down is fraught with danger. The crew spends two and a half tense months unpacking ejection seats with live rockets, twin turbojet engines, and a Vulcan cannon. As each aircraft is stripped down, we get a glimpse inside to see how each part works-from engines to wings to black boxes. Some pieces are tested and recycled for use in active planes, a process each team member takes very seriously. At 30,000 feet, the stakes for these breakdowns couldnt be higher.

programme.title: Inside Melbourne Airport
programme.desc: Brad and the ground services team have just 90 minutes to turn around an Air India flight for take-off. A kangaroo in the car park keeps ground transport manager Trent on his toes. Environment officer Dave discovers illegal bee hives within the airport precinct, and baggage handler Brodie battles carousel jams.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation Special Report
programme.desc: Sometimes the trust between pilots and their planes breaks down, and the cockpit inadvertently becomes a struggle that pits man against machine. Eager crowds gather at an air show to watch the new pride of French aviation, but witness a fiery disaster instead. During a routine test flight, one of the worlds most advanced planes nosedives into the Mediterranean. And, when a packed Airbus disappears over the Atlantic, investigators face a two-year deep-sea search for answers.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: September 1, 1983 Korean Air Lines Flight #007 is high above the Sea of Japan with 269 people on board. Hoping to save fuel during the last leg of its marathon flight from New York to Seoul, it requests permission to fly at a higher altitude. When the aircraft reaches its new altitude, however, it is rocked by rapid decompression, spirals out of control and crashes into the sea. An international controversy erupts, and within days, Soviet officials admit to shooting down the passenger plane. With Cold War tensions at an all-time high, its up to international investigators to keep two superpowers at bay. But can they prevent an all-out armed conflict, and can they determine what went wrong?

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Every time a plane crashes, the world takes notice. And so do the experts whose job it is to figure out what happened. Air Crash Investigation uncovers the truth behind the most legendary aviation disasters, and every episode features eyewitness accounts, captivating reenactments, state-of-the-art CGI, and interviews with the investigators who ultimately determined what went wrong. This season on Air Crash Investigation: Conflicting stories emerge after a Swedish cargo plane spirals to the ground; an African airliner crashes in the wilderness and the cause proves too sinister to be believed; and, when a Pakistani passenger jet disappears on approach to Kathmandu, Nepalese investigators must determine how it ended up on a crash course with the Himalayas.

programme.title: Airport Mega Move
programme.desc: Istanbuls Ataturk airport, the home of Turkish Airlines for decades, is about to close. Across town, a new state-of-the-art airport will begin operations but with flights in high demand, they have just 12 hours to move everything to their new home. This massive logistical challenge is of a scale never before attempted. Once this colossal move is completed, Turkish Airlines new home will be on track to become the busiest airport in the world.

programme.title: Inside Sydney Airport
programme.desc: Sydney is experiencing one of the rainiest seasons on record. With violent storms closing down 2 runways, an incoming flight relays a distress call to the Integrated Operations Centre. A man has suffered an apparent heart attack on board. Will the plane be able to land in this weather? Later, a fire training drill turns into a real emergency as an on board fire is reported from another plane.

programme.title: Inside Sydney Airport
programme.desc: With weekend vacationers and commuters returning home, Friday is always a busy day at the airport. More passengers means more problems, keeping the Duty Managers on high alert. Today its an air ambulance emergency, security breaches, illegal drugs and a shouting passenger facing a ban from the airline shes booked to fly on.

programme.title: Inside Melbourne Airport
programme.desc: Brad and the ground services team have just 90 minutes to turn around an Air India flight for take-off. A kangaroo in the car park keeps ground transport manager Trent on his toes. Environment officer Dave discovers illegal bee hives within the airport precinct, and baggage handler Brodie battles carousel jams.

programme.title: Inside Melbourne Airport
programme.desc: A Bali-bound flight faces delays after a service truck crashes into its undercarriage. Australian Border Force find illegal weapons in a passengers luggage. Unregistered taxi drivers are caught in the act and theres a fuel leak on the tarmac. At night, a mysterious Soviet-era plane lands unannounced.

programme.title: Destruction Decoded
programme.desc: This series will go back through the record to explore life-altering, earth-shattering, unforgettable events using a combination of carefully selected archive, cutting edge CGI and informative scripting in this popular science format. As well as exploring spectacular archive, illustrating the full toll these disasters can take, well dig into the science behind each event, shining a light on the most fascinating elements and giving an understanding on how and why these events occur.

Unregistered taxi drivers are caught in the act and theres a fuel leak on the tarmac. At night, a mysterious Soviet-era plane lands unannounced.

programme.title: Plane Crash Recreated
programme.desc: On July 19, 1989, United Airlines Flight 232 departed from Denver to Chicago when the DC-10 aircraft suffered a catastrophic failure. The crew onboard faced the impossible task of landing with a total loss of control. 112 passengers perished in the horrific crash and 184 people survived. Survivors, give a first-hand account of what could have been their final moments.

programme.title: Plane Crash Recreated
programme.desc: On January 15, 2009, US Airways Flight 1549 took off from New York Citys LaGuardia Airport and collided with a flock of birds, causing both engines to fail. Captain Chesley "Sully" Sullenberger and co-pilot Jeffrey Skyles successfully performed an emergency landing in the Hudson River, saving all 155 people on board. Survivors of the "Miracle on the Hudson" share their experiences.

programme.title: Plane Crash Recreated
programme.desc: On June 1, 2009, Air France Flight 447, en route from Rio de Janeiro to Paris, vanished over the Atlantic Ocean. The aircrafts wreckage was found nearly two years later after an extensive search. Flight recorders revealed a tragic sequence of events causing the crash, killing all onboard. BEA investigators provide insights into the case of the missing Airbus A330.

programme.title: Inside Sydney Airport
programme.desc: Sydney Airports Baggage Manager Kevin is having a day from hell as he trouble-shoots a number of mechanical breakdowns that could bring operations to a standstill. Meanwhile, security screening discovers a passenger travelling with a gun and the Federal Police investigate a suspicious bag left at the terminal entrance.

programme.title: Inside Sydney Airport
programme.desc: The busy Christmas Season brings extra challenges with families escaping Sydney on vacation. But the airport is thrown into jeopardy of a shutdown with the discovery of an unidentified white powder on board an incoming flight. Speculation mounts about whether the powder is harmless, or the deadly terror weapon anthrax.

programme.title: Science of Stupid
programme.desc: Science of Stupid, series 8. Dallas Campbell hosts the show that combines serious science with some of the craziest, most spectacular user generated clips ever recorded. In each programme we show 40 to 50 clips of misadventure: ordinary folk making extraordinary mistakes and paying the price. We analyse the science behind the mishaps, with the help of bespoke animation and super slow-motion cinematography.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler: Tropical Takedown
programme.desc: Air and Marine Operations agents in Fajardo chase a vessel to a marina and suspects flee, leaving over 280 kilos of cocaine hidden inside. Mayaguez AMO agents provide armed transport for the USCG, transferring a murder suspect from sea to airfield. Later, they intercept a migrant vessel by shooting out its engine. Agents in the U.S. Virgin Island seize over $750k in cash from a smuggling vessel.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler: Tropical Takedown
programme.desc: Air and Marine Interdiction agents in Mayaguez intercept traffickers coming from the Dominican Republic with over $60 million in cocaine onboard. In Fajardo, agents investigate a boat suspected of smuggling cocaine from St. Thomas to Puerto Rico. In the U.S Virgin Islands, agents search for a sunken vessel believed to be carrying bulk cash from drug dealers.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler: Tropical Takedown
programme.desc: Air and Marine Operations newest agent in Mayaguez gets his first major seizure when he uncovers over $8 million of cocaine hidden inside a boat. Homeland Security Investigations arrests multiple longshoremen at a seaport involved in a smuggling ring responsible for importing cocaine from the Dominican republic. AMO agents in Fajardo and USVI team up and race to Culebra to intercept a smuggler.

programme.title: Naming the Dead
programme.desc: Bryan Johnsons first case as a new detective in 2020 was a homicide - a man found near an oil well site in Stark County, Ohio. But four years later, without even a name for the victim, Bryan has not been able to close the case. He enlists the help of the DNA Doe Project to try and find out the mans identity.

programme.title: Naming the Dead
programme.desc: For 28 years, the horrifying case of a young man who was burned alive sat on a shelf in the Atlanta Police Department. Without a name for him, the case remained inactive. Now, investigators have teamed up with the DNA Doe Project to attempt to identify the "man on fire" and at last provide his family with resolution.

programme.title: Naming the Dead
programme.desc: For 38 years, the remains of a young woman - found murdered by the side of a freeway outside of Tyler, Texas - have sat inside a cardboard box in the Smith County Sheriffs Office. Now, with retirement looming, Detective David Turner is teaming up with the DNA Doe Project to solve the case, find her family and - finally - lay her to rest.

programme.title: Drain the Oceans
programme.desc: In the summer of 1940 adolf hitlers nazis have conquered france, just 20 miles of sea seperates his army and his next target, great britain. The mighty luftwaffe is sent to bomb britain into submission, destroy the royal airforce and prepare for seaborne invasion. Now we can uncover the wrecks of planes and ships that reveal the truth how britain stood firm against the nazi raiders and defeated hitler in the battle of britain.

programme.title: Drain the Oceans
programme.desc: Extreme weather patterns have threatened ships and mariners for centuries. The perfect storm?. towering walls of water, powerful winds and churning seas can overwhelm any ship. What brought down the largest haul of Spanish treasure off the coast of Florida? And whats the truth behind the strange disappearance of the mightiest invasion force of ancient times? Drain the Oceans reveals the secrets of Stormy Seas.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler: Tropical Takedown
programme.desc: A fishermans tip leads Air and Marine agents in the U.S. Virgin Islands to over 80 kilos of cocaine washed ashore on a public beach. Two fishing vessels are intercepted between the Dominican Republic and Puerto Rico, suspected of smuggling drugs. Agents from the Fajardo unit patrol remote trails showing signs of drug trafficking routes.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler: Tropical Takedown
programme.desc: Air and Marine Operations agents in Fajardo chase a vessel to a marina and suspects flee, leaving over 280 kilos of cocaine hidden inside. Mayaguez AMO agents provide armed transport for the USCG, transferring a murder suspect from sea to airfield. Later, they intercept a migrant vessel by shooting out its engine. AMO agents in Fajardo and USVI team up and race to Culebra to intercept a smuggler.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler
programme.desc: Even during a pandemic, smuggling never stops. After adjusting tactics in the early days of the COVID crisis to meet the increasing flow of narcotics coming across our southern land borders, the Department of Homeland Security is now pivoting back to our nations airports where international travel is starting to rev back up again. Whether narco-traffickers try to slip through an airport, seaport or land crossing, vigilant officers are on high-alert to stem the flow of illegal contraband. Using every tool available to them, DHS will stop at nothing to catch a smuggler.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation Special Report
programme.desc: Some of the deadliest air crashes in history have been caused by simple misunderstandings, and its a tiny error in the cockpit that brought tragedy to Quincy Airport in Illinois. Meanwhile, a minor mistake, a non-standard approach, and heavy smoke add up to a tragic misunderstanding that cost the lives of everyone on board Garuda Indonesia Flight 152. And, however disastrous, never has a misunderstanding taken as devastating a turn as on the island of Tenerife and the single deadliest aviation accident of all time.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: March 10th, 1989 Bound for Winnipeg, Air Ontario Flight #1363 prepares for takeoff after a brief layover at a remote Northern airport. Already an hour behind schedule, the pilots fear the heavy snowfall will further delay their departure, and after refueling, they taxi into position and accelerate. The jet reaches takeoff speed but struggles to get airborne, and although it clears the trees at the end of the runway, starts shaking violently and less than a minute later crashes into the woods. It takes months for investigators to determine what went wrong. And tragically, their findings come too late to prevent an icy killer from striking again.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: October 31, 1994 - Its a frigid Halloween night in the skies above Chicago. Bad weather is delaying dozens of flights, including American Eagle 41-84. Suddenly - the plane spins wildly out of control. The pilots fight desperately to right their plane - but cant. It smashes into a cornfield. All 68 people on board are killed instantly. Investigators eventually discover the cause is a rare weather phenomena - and a fatal design flaw.

programme.title: Dutch Caribbean Coastguards
programme.desc: In the new reality-series "Dutch Caribbean Coastguards" we join the Coastguard operating round the islands of Curacao, Aruba, St. Martin and Bonaire. On a daily basis, they fight drugs-trafficking at sea, prevent immigrants to illegally enter the islands and operate searchandrescue missions to salvage lost tourists. This important and dangerous work is done by a team of highly motivated professionals, who can also rely on help from their allies, the Dutch Royal Navy and US Coastguard. With their ultrafast boats, rescue helicopters and reconnaissance planes they safeguard the borders of the Dutch Caribbean to make sure the island remain the paradise they are.

programme.title: Dutch Caribbean Coastguards
programme.desc: In the new reality-series "Dutch Caribbean Coastguards" we join the Coastguard operating round the islands of Curacao, Aruba, St. Martin and Bonaire. programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler: Tropical Takedown
programme.desc: Air and Marine Operations agents in the U.S. Virgin Islands enlist the U.S. Border Patrols tactical BORTAC team to help dismantle a smuggling ring on Saint John. Fajardo AMO agents pursue a vessel that runs aground, carrying over 1,300 kilos of cocaine. In western Puerto Rico, agents from the Mayaguez office assist the U.S. Coast Guard in rescuing migrants who go overboard at sea.

Using every tool available to them, DHS will stop at nothing to catch a smuggler.

programme.title: Airport Security: Peru
programme.desc: Security teams at Perus biggest airport work 24-7 to stop illegal activity. The biggest problem: cocaine smuggling. Police rush to handle a rare incident on a domestic flight: something suspicious in a Serbian citizens bag. Agents find liquid cocaine disguised in drink bottles in another mans bag. A passenger without luggage reappears carrying a suitcase and agents rush to investigate. Counterfeit cash is uncovered in the mail facility.

programme.title: Airport Security: Peru
programme.desc: Security teams at Perus biggest airport work 24-7 to stop illegal activity. The biggest problem: cocaine smuggling. Police stop a woman travelling with her 5-year-old. If shes a carrier, agents must figure out what to do with the child. A Mexican citizen is found with a large amount of beer and soft drinks. All these goods may contain cocaine. Officers uncover a creative new method of hiding cocaine in food packaging.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler

programme.title: Naming the Dead
programme.desc: In 1961, a body was found crushed under ice in a railroad car in Nebraska and quickly buried. After discovering his grave marked with the words "Unknown Negro," local journalist Marresa Burke is determined to find his family. Teaming up the DNA Doe Project, they take a sample from his exhumed body before following a trail of clues across the country.

programme.title: Naming the Dead
programme.desc: A convicted serial killer, Larry Eyler, confessed to the murder of more than 20 men across Illinois and Indiana in the 1980s. But several of his victims remained unidentified for decades. Now, after years of frustrated efforts, Newton County Coroner Scott McCord enlists the help of the DNA Doe Project to try and identify one of the last unknown victims and return him to his family.

programme.title: Naming the Dead
programme.desc: Bryan Johnsons first case as a new detective in 2020 was a homicide - a man found near an oil well site in Stark County, Ohio. But four years later, without even a name for the victim, Bryan has not been able to close the case. He enlists the help of the DNA Doe Project to try and find out the mans identity.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler
programme.desc: CBP Atlanta discovers a suitcase left in the airport by its owner, which contains cocaine concealed in coffee bags. Suspecting a trend, officers begin blitzing flights from the source country and make a second arrest. CBP Miami investigates a series of wildlife trafficking crimes, including an elderly man suspected of smuggling birds to the US in his pants; and a shipment of more than 1400 turtle shell fragments that were forcibly removed from an endangered species. HSI New York arrests a suspected cocaine smuggler who works at JFK and uncovers information that takes-down an entire drug-trafficking ring.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler
programme.desc: CBP Nogales stops a pedestrian carrying fentanyl internally and seizes a vehicle with a mixed load of heroin and fentanyl with a combined street value of over $760,000. In San Diego, CBP officers empty a gas tank filled with 35 packages of meth, all tied together for quick retrieval. Spring breakers return to Atlantas airport with varying contraband, including $38,000 of undeclared cash inside a bag of dirty laundry.

programme.title: Tiger Queen of Taru
programme.desc: The story of Maya the tigress plays out in a tiger reserve in Tadoba, Central India. Here, Bengal tigers chase wild dogs, fight sloth bears and feud among themselves over bloodlines and territory in never-before seen footage. Maya writes her own rules when it comes to raising a litter, yet motherhood doesnt come easy. One thing is clear, Maya will do whatever it takes to secure her bloodline within the Kingdom of Taru.

programme.title: Future Cat
programme.desc: Weve seen big cats past and their present, but until now we could never even imagine their future! With cutting edge visual effects, Future Cats explores far-off future challenges that may await the big cats. Leading experts discuss possible extreme planetary scenarios and the adaptations big cats would to need to make in order to survive.

programme.title: The Worlds Most Famous Tiger
programme.desc: Known as the Queen of Ranthambore, Machli is the most famous tiger in the world. The legendary tigress is a fearsome warrior known for her daring exploits. And shes the mother of an incredible four litters of cubs.

programme.title: Serengeti Speed Queen
programme.desc: Nzuri is the Speed Queen of the Serengeti - but being fast isnt enough. Shes constantly bullied by hyenas on the grassland and hunted by lions in the marsh. When two of her cubs are killed, the family is exiled to the transition forest. There, she learns to adapt her hunting methods and adds strategy to speed in order to outwit her enemies and steer her remaining cubs successfully to adulthood.

programme.title: Cougar vs. Wolf
programme.desc: Cougar expert Boone Smith tracks deep into Montanas Bitterroot Mountains in search of evidence detailing the competition between the two biggest predators roaming this stunning winter landscape. His goal: pinpoint the places where cougar-wolf conflicts most often occur by gathering clues about each creatures hunting, feeding and fighting behaviors.

programme.title: Future Cat
programme.desc: Weve seen big cats past and their present, but until now we could never even imagine their future! With cutting edge visual effects, Future Cats explores far-off future challenges that may await the big cats. Leading experts discuss possible extreme planetary scenarios and the adaptations big cats would to need to make in order to survive.

programme.title: The Worlds Most Famous Tiger
programme.desc: Known as the Queen of Ranthambore, Machli is the most famous tiger in the world. The legendary tigress is a fearsome warrior known for her daring exploits. And shes the mother of an incredible four litters of cubs.

programme.title: Ultimate Animals Compilations
programme.desc: They are the backbone of the natural world, and in this documentary series, we explore some of the most interesting and amazing animals that roam our planet. Each episode focusses on two special creatures, revealing their characteristics and behaviours, and feature interviews with various experts alongside stunning video footage of the animals in their natural environments. A fascinating series that explores the animals instincts and anatomies using state-of-the-art cameras and graphics, the creatures featured include polar bears, tigers, octopuses, elephants and orangutans.

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: Its summer in Michigan, which means time to bale some hay! Its a grueling process, but Dr. Pol, Charles, and Ben manage to mow their hayfield, which is the first step in baling. But a surprise rainstorm could ruin this years hay haul. They hope for sun, so their crop doesnt spoil before they can bale. Meanwhile, the Pols bring in their next animal to the farm - an emu!

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: Its the county fair season! The Pols plan to get at least two cows and six sheep at the auction, but they have a lot to do before that can happen. First up, they must install a new perimeter fence. Charles and Ben think they are off to a good start, but when Dr. Pol points out how sneaky sheep can be, their workload doubles. Meanwhile, Beth is hoping for a goat at the small animal auction.

programme.title: Ultimate Animals Compilations
programme.desc: They are the backbone of the natural world, and in this documentary series, we explore some of the most interesting and amazing animals that roam our planet. Each episode focusses on two special creatures, revealing their characteristics and behaviours, and feature interviews with various experts alongside stunning video footage of the animals in their natural environments. A fascinating series that explores the animals instincts and anatomies using state-of-the-art cameras and graphics, the creatures featured include polar bears, tigers, octopuses, elephants and orangutans.

programme.title: Prairie Dog Manor
programme.desc: Follow the exploits of these cute creatures from northern New Mexico. "Prairie Dog Manor" showcases the unique behaviour of these special animals and highlights the different relationships that exist between the clan members from Valles Caldera National Preserve. Beginning with the prairie dogs preparing for the coming winter, Carl and the pups get ready for hibernation. But they face danger from an unlikely source as deadly predators forge an alliance to threaten every dog in the territory. Further episodes explore the mating season when the warm weather arrives and battles commence between the males to earn the right to mate with the females. Soon, the females are pregnant and new pups arrive and the whole cycle starts again.

programme.title: Prairie Dog Manor
programme.desc: Follow the exploits of these cute creatures from northern New Mexico. "Prairie Dog Manor" showcases the unique behaviour of these special animals and highlights the different relationships that exist between the clan members from Valles Caldera National Preserve. Beginning with the prairie dogs preparing for the coming winter, Carl and the pups get ready for hibernation. But they face danger from an unlikely source as deadly predators forge an alliance to threaten every dog in the territory. Further episodes explore the mating season when the warm weather arrives and battles commence between the males to earn the right to mate with the females. Soon, the females are pregnant and new pups arrive and the whole cycle starts again.

programme.title: Predator v Prey
programme.desc: A forensic look at how leopards hunt prey both large and small, offering a new perspective on the way these silent killers stalk and ambush everything from impala to wildebeest and catfish to storks. A female leopard deploys stealth, strength and agility to take down prey on land, in water and from the air.

programme.title: Predator Bloodlines
programme.desc: She leads the formidable Sausage Tree Pride, an ensemble of buffalo-slaying huntresses. That is, until the migration crosses their prime domain and they demonstrate ultimate adaptability and switch prey species. But the pride has been compromised after a split-away group left their ranks and now she must muster her troupe to excel at motherhood while male coalitions complicate dynamics all around them.

programme.title: Predator v Prey
programme.desc: A forensic look at how lions hunt large prey like buffalo and zebra, offering new perspectives on the way these predators stalk, chase and kill. A lone lioness relies on cunning to feed her newborn cubs, whilst a fearless pride tries to take down the biggest prey of all, a giant African elephant.

programme.title: Predator v Prey
programme.desc: A forensic look at how leopards hunt prey both large and small, offering a new perspective on the way these silent killers stalk and ambush everything from impala to wildebeest and catfish to storks. programme.title: Predator Bloodlines
programme.desc: She leads the formidable Sausage Tree Pride, an ensemble of buffalo-slaying huntresses. That is, until the migration crosses their prime domain and they demonstrate ultimate adaptability and switch prey species. But the pride has been compromised after a split-away group left their ranks and now she must muster her troupe to excel at motherhood while male coalitions complicate dynamics all around them.

programme.title: Predator Bloodlines
programme.desc: Identified by her burnt orange gaze, she leads a pride of five closely-related lionesses and their six offspring. They overcome every challenge as a precision unit: the gauntlet of the buffalo hunt or the upheaval of new males that could either decimate the prides ranks or offer her the chance to finally mother cubs. But desperate drought and crippling disease push the sisterhood to the absolute brink of survival.

programme.title: Predator Bloodlines
programme.desc: She overthrew the preceding ruler of North Clan in an unprecedented take-over, fighting her way up from a lowly rank to matriarch. She is both a ruthless battle commander, leading her clan in warfare against rivals and adversaries like lion, and devoted guardian to her clan and parent to her offspring.

programme.title: Predator v Prey
programme.desc: A forensic look at how lions hunt large prey like buffalo and zebra, offering new perspectives on the way these predators stalk, chase and kill. A lone lioness relies on cunning to feed her newborn cubs, whilst a fearless pride tries to take down the biggest prey of all, a giant African elephant.

programme.title: Predator v Prey
programme.desc: A forensic look at how cheetahs hunt their prey, offering new perspectives on the tactics employed by these expert predators when stalking, chasing and bringing down antelope and wildebeest. Following a young cheetah mother over 18-months as she teaches her three cubs the secrets of the hunt.

programme.title: Predator v Prey
programme.desc: A forensic look at how Nile crocodiles hunt, offering new perspectives on the patient and precise tactics they use when ambushing migratory herds of wildebeest and zebra that pass through their territories. A male crocodile must target large prey in a bid to survive the harshest time of the year.

programme.title: Predator v Prey
programme.desc: A forensic look at how polar bears hunt prey, offering new perspectives on the tactics they use to track, stalk and ambush seals, whales and walruses. We follow a mother fighting to feed her two cubs in the harsh polar extremes, and a young male driven by starvation to tackle enormous prey.

programme.title: Predator v Prey
programme.desc: A forensic look at how leopards hunt prey both large and small, offering a new perspective on the way these silent killers stalk and ambush everything from impala to wildebeest and catfish to storks. A female leopard deploys stealth, strength and agility to take down prey on land, in water and from the air.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Reality show follows Dutch-born veterinarian Jan Pol, his family and employees everyday. Jan Pol and his wife Diane started their own practice in Weidman, Michigan, Pol Veterinary Services, back in in 1981. Dr Pol takes a good care of every family pet and head of livestock no matter what size or condition and is a true legend in the community. Dr Pol has seen it all, treating numerous patients every single day, his daily routine is more than 12 hours but nothing can stop him from being devoted to his patients.

programme.title: Return of the Predators
programme.desc: After 30 years of war and destruction, Gorongosa National Park in Mozambique has undergone a remarkable restoration. Herbivores once again bound across the plains, but hunters have been slower to return, leaving the park out of balance...until now!

programme.title: Africas Deadliest
programme.desc: A national Geographic documentary looking into the deadliest animals that roam Africa. Examining animals that have evolved complex weapons from teeth to claws and agility so that they can protect themselves and battle effectively. From elephant tusks that can defend or attack to the fur, speed and agility of seals. Showing how these animals have exceptional skills and power alongside their body features that have developed into ideal tools for their needs.

programme.title: Ultimate Animals Compilations
programme.desc: They are the backbone of the natural world, and in this documentary series, we explore some of the most interesting and amazing animals that roam our planet. Each episode focusses on two special creatures, revealing their characteristics and behaviours, and feature interviews with various experts alongside stunning video footage of the animals in their natural environments. A fascinating series that explores the animals instincts and anatomies using state-of-the-art cameras and graphics, the creatures featured include polar bears, tigers, octopuses, elephants and orangutans.

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: The Pols need to break ground for a new outbuilding that will house incoming livestock and Charles has dreamt up an outrageous idea of what that structure can be - and it just may be just crazy enough to work. At the auction, the Pols are hoping to purchase sheep and cows, but the skyrocketing bids threaten their big plans.

programme.title: Ultimate Animals Compilations

programme.title: Snakes in the City: Uncharted Compilation
programme.desc: Simon and Sioux are on a mission to rescue Indias "big four" deadliest snakes for the first time in their careers. Simon strokes the head of a deadly spectacled cobra for the first time on camera. A Russels viper hides in the heart of a bustling city park. One of the worlds most venomous snakes, the common krait, hides in a shoe outside a familys home.

programme.title: Ten Deadliest Snakes with Nigel Marven
programme.desc: From the wetlands of Rio Grande to the mighty Amazon rainforest, Brazil is a hotspot for deadly snakes and Nigel is seeking them out as he counts down his top ten. Found only on the tiny Snake Island, theres only a few hundred Golden Lanceheads in the world. But can they beat the snake responsible for many human bites, the jararaca, to the top spot? With over 25,000 reported bites across the country each year, Nigel delves into the fascinating science behind the anti-venom treatments that save thousands of lives.

programme.title: Snakes In the City Compilations
programme.desc: Simon and Sioux are amazed by the respect Indian locals have for their venomous scaled neighbors. The calls are pouring in, and Snake Shyam helps rescue a deadly Russells viper tangled in netting. Shyams son, Surya, is breaking concrete steps to help Simon and Sioux finally capture a rat snake. Then, the duo teams with Gowri Shanker to catch and release not one but two enormous king cobras.

programme.title: Snakes in the City: Uncharted Compilation
programme.desc: Simon and Sioux are on a mission to rescue Indias "big four" deadliest snakes for the first time in their careers. Simon strokes the head of a deadly spectacled cobra for the first time on camera. A Russels viper hides in the heart of a bustling city park. One of the worlds most venomous snakes, the common krait, hides in a shoe outside a familys home.

programme.title: Ten Deadliest Snakes with Nigel Marven
programme.desc: From the wetlands of Rio Grande to the mighty Amazon rainforest, Brazil is a hotspot for deadly snakes and Nigel is seeking them out as he counts down his top ten. Found only on the tiny Snake Island, theres only a few hundred Golden Lanceheads in the world. But can they beat the snake responsible for many human bites, the jararaca, to the top spot? With over 25,000 reported bites across the country each year, Nigel delves into the fascinating science behind the anti-venom treatments that save thousands of lives.

programme.title: Ten Deadliest Snakes with Nigel Marven
programme.desc: Mexico is home to an incredible 400 snake species, nearly a fifth of which are venomous. Nigel searches high and low for his top ten, from ancient oak and pine forests to the towering cacti of the baking hot Mexican desert. Rattlesnakes dominate the landscape, but the widely feared terciopelo and the beautiful Taylors Cantil are also in the running for number one spot. Its not just snakes that bite here - Nigel has a painful encounter with a lizard with jaws like a vice.

programme.title: Ten Deadliest Snakes with Nigel Marven
programme.desc: To survive in the scorching deserts of Oman and the United Arab Emirates is no mean feat. The snakes that live here are highly-adapted and Nigel puts his skills to the test to find his top ten. Will the saw-scaled vipers powerful venom and lightning fast reflexes be a match for the backwards strike of the puff adder? On his journey Nigel encounters the ancient "ships of the desert" and a seriously cute hedgehog.

programme.title: Snakes In the City Compilations
programme.desc: Simon and Sioux are amazed by the respect Indian locals have for their venomous scaled neighbors. The calls are pouring in, and Snake Shyam helps rescue a deadly Russells viper tangled in netting. Shyams son, Surya, is breaking concrete steps to help Simon and Sioux finally capture a rat snake. Then, the duo teams with Gowri Shanker to catch and release not one but two enormous king cobras.

programme.title: Snakes In the City Compilations
programme.desc: A dangerous heatwave surges across India, which means more deadly snakes are on the move looking for shelter. Simon and Sioux join Snake Shyam and Gowri Shanker to battle the heat and rescue hiding snakes. The team tries to rescue a spectacled cobra from a water pit and a deadly Russells viper hiding in a bookstore. For the first time in 30 years, Simon tails and rescues a king cobra by himself!

programme.title: Snakes In the City Compilations
programme.desc: Simon, Sioux, and Mbali split up because the calls keep coming in. Sioux and Mbali face a feisty mamba on their own, while Simon catches a second black mamba solo. Then, Simon teaches Mbali how to bag her first spitting cobra while Sioux focuses on an elusive boomslang. Finally, Simon rescues a huge snake hidden in a shed while Mbali and Sioux contain a feisty, cornered black mamba.

programme.title: Snakes in the City: Uncharted Compilation
programme.desc: Simon and Sioux continue their training with apprentice Mbali and scale new heights - Bond Style - to help her rescue a huge black mamba. Mbali then assists Simon in safely capturing a green mamba from a tree. During the training, Mbali comes very close to danger when she releases her first black mamba. The final test is to capture a massive black mamba that is hiding inside a garden shed.

programme.title: Snakes in the City: Uncharted Compilation
programme.desc: Simon and Sioux are on a mission to rescue Indias "big four" deadliest snakes for the first time in their careers. programme.title: Animal Fight Club
programme.desc: Documentary series featuring fearsome fights between the biggest and the baddest animals on planet. Watch the animals fighting for their food, territory, rights and life. Follow the drama and adrenaline of the toughest and fearcest fights in savannah, jungles and water. It is an ultimate survival with no rules whatsoever. Uncover the extraordinary motivations and strategies used by the animal world.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pasaules krāsainākās ģimenes atgriešanās! Barbapapas - lielā ģimene! Barbapapu dzīvē nav rutīnas. Katra diena ir pārsteigumu un piedzīvojumu pilna!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērniem ir garlaicīgi, jo ārā līst lietus. Barbagudrais uztaisa dekoderi, kas tulko dzīvnieku skaņas.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons priecājas par pilsētas saimniecības atklāšanu, bet dzīvnieki aizbēg, kad viņš atstāj vaļā vārtus. Vai dzīvniekus pagūs atrast? Bāzs māca Džonatanam un Padingtonam par atkārtoto izmantošanu. Vai par veikumu viņi saņems balvu?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons, Džonatans un Džūdija raizējas, ka izsmēluši suņa Lakija veiksmi. Kā viņi pateiks to Sofijai? Pie Bāza ciemojas brāļameita Simija. Viņš grib pārsteigt meiteni ar ideālu picu, bet tas nebūs viegli izsalkušo dzīvnieku dēļ.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Kurš grib nozagt Karija kunga augstu vērtēto milzu ķirbi? Izmeklē policists Velss un Padingtons. Parkā ir slidotava, un Grūbera kungs māca Padingtonam slidot pirms ledus diskotēkas. Vai pašam pietiks drosmes kāpt uz ledus pēc kritiena?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Pēdējā skolas dienā Džonatans un Džūdija nespēj vienoties, ko iesākt, tāpēc jāizlemj Padingtonam. Brauni atgriežas no brauciena uz pludmali ne tikai ar smiltīm matos. Kāpēc tā gliemežnīca kustās?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons sadraudzējas ar kāpuru, kā arī kopā ar Džūdiju uzzina, ka visas pārmaiņas nav sliktas. Brauni piedalās ļoti azartiskā spēlē "Grīda ir lava", bet kurš uzvarēs? Ko par viņiem domās svarīgs viesis?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Pievienojieties Padingtonam, kurš kļūst par pirmo lāčunautu, pateicoties Braunu ģimenei. Džonatans, Džūdija un Padingtons salasa dārzā visas kazenes, bet Karija kungs uzskata, ka dažas pienākas viņam. Vai tā ir jāatdod?

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Katram bērnam ir jādemonstrē savs talants. Videospēles ir jautras, bet jāizbauda labi laikapstākļi!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabravo noķer maskējušos vandāli. Pazudusi Barbabravo mīļākā mašīna.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Nē! Beigas! Barbabravo vairs nav mazulis, viņš ir liels puika!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbapapas izlemj taupīt elektrību, taču viņu ieceri izjauc Barbagudrais un Barbabella, kas izgudrojuši slepenu elektrību patērējošu projektu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pasaules krāsainākās ģimenes atgriešanās! Barbapapas - lielā ģimene! Barbapapu dzīvē nav rutīnas. Katra diena ir pārsteigumu un piedzīvojumu pilna!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērniem ir garlaicīgi, jo ārā līst lietus. Barbagudrais uztaisa dekoderi, kas tulko dzīvnieku skaņas.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims cenšas būt divos pasākumos reizē.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs un Tija savā mājā atrod pazudušu mamutu.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tomijs piedalās raķešu sacīkstēs, Tims atbalsta savu brāli.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepas franču draudzene ēzelīte Delfīna ierodas ciemos. Pepa paņem līdzi Delfīnu uz bērnudārzu, kur viņai iemāca "Bing, bong" dziesmu, kas patīk visai klasei.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Kad mamma palīdz Trušu jaunkundzei ugunsdzēsēju depo, viņu izsauc nodzēst liesmas tēta nekontrolējamajam grilam!

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Vecvecāki ierodas uz vakariņām pie mammas un tēta. Pepa un Džordžs ir pārāk noguruši, lai ietu gulēt, kamēr nav dzirdējuši pasaku.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa no dārziņa atnes lācīti, par ko rūpēties, bet viņa raizējas, ka viņam nebūs jautri.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Ir suņa Denija dzimšanas diena, un ar vectēva Suņa un vectēva Cūkas palīdzību bērni piedalās pirātu dārgumu medībās.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Visi Pepas pilsētas iedzīvotāji vēlas satikt Kartupeļa kungu, kas ieradies atvērt jauno sporta centru.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Gazeles jaunkundze ved Pepu un viņas draugus izbraucienā ar vilcienu, kur viņiem jāatzīmē aktivitāšu lapas. Tikmēr Pedro visu laiku pazaudē savu biļeti.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepas ģimene dodas uz muzeja Mēness izstādi kopā ar Džordža draugu ziloni Edmondu. Bet Pepa domā, ka viņi dodas uz īsto Mēnesi, un raizējas.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora un Zābaciņš palīdz pūķītei Svītijai iemācīties lidot un atgriezties pie vecākiem Mākoņu alās. Kad Lielā Sarkanā Cāļa burvju triks liek Karalienei un Garnadzim samainīties vietām, Dora un Zābaciņš palīdz viņus pārvērst atpakaļ!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais izturas dīvaini. Ko viņš slēpj? Barbabērni darīs visu, lai to uzzinātu. Barbapapas izlemj taupīt elektrību, taču viņu ieceri izjauc Barbagudrais un Barbabella, kas izgudrojuši slepenu elektrību patērējošu projektu.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērniem patīk nakts pasaciņas, bet ne tad, ja tās visu laiku atkārtojas.

Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Lilijas nāriņu ballīte tiek atsaukta, kad sāk līt. Laiks celtniecības risinājumam!

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Mērei Greitvejai vajag daudz picas, un ātri! Bet, kad pieslēdzas Ātrmeistars, suņiem jānovērš viņa picas problēma. Kad ģimene pa Ātrmeistara ceļu nevar pagūt uz lidostu, Rabla komandai līdz izlidošanai jāuzbūvē jauns ceļš.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims meklē Kajai uzkodu bez purvzāles.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims cenšas būt divos pasākumos reizē.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims novērš Tijas domas no Taskija, kamēr tas mazgājas veļas mašīnā.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora rāda dvīņiem mūzikas lādīti, kuras mazā dejotāja atdzīvojas! Kad aizbēg viņas burvju zābaciņi, draugi dodas tos meklēt. Saule nevar iemigt, tāpēc atsakās norietēt! Dorai jāatrod Spilvenmākonis, lai Saule varētu doties pie miera.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora palīdz Benijam un vienraga dinozauram Uni atgūt pazaudēto burvju otu, lai Uni varētu atgriezties pie sava mīļdzīvnieka Zaķradža. Dora palīdz rumpulītei Hārtijai, lai viņa beidzot varētu piedalīties Rumpuļu spēlēs.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pasaules krāsainākās ģimenes atgriešanās! Barbapapas - lielā ģimene! Barbapapu dzīvē nav rutīnas. Katra diena ir pārsteigumu un piedzīvojumu pilna!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni grib izgudrot, kā Da Vinči. Bērniem jāizlemj - doties baseinā vai izbraucienā ar riteņiem.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons savaino celi un dodas pie Dr. Jasmīnas. Kad viņa iziet, viņš tiek sajaukts ar ārstu. Vai Brauna kunga pidžamu ballīte atbildīs Brauna kundzes standartiem, kad Simi un Toka paliks pa nakti?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons palīdz izperēt olu, bet ir jāgaida ļoti ilgi. Kad tā beidzot izšķiļas, viņš tiek pie pārsteiguma! Padingtons vēlas, kaut varētu piedalīties Braunu kāzās, apskatot fotogrāfijas, un viņi nolemj to visu atkārtot!

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Mērei Greitvejai vajag daudz picas, un ātri! Bet, kad pieslēdzas Ātrmeistars, suņiem jānovērš viņa picas problēma. Kad ģimene pa Ātrmeistara ceļu nevar pagūt uz lidostu, Rabla komandai līdz izlidošanai jāuzbūvē jauns ceļš.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Mēre Greitveja un Dakija Dū kungs vēlas nodemonstrēt savas izpletņlēkšanas prasmes. Taču, kad patraucē vējš, suņi palīdz viņiem lēkt ar izpletni uz zemes! Kad Vīleram un cūkai Trifelei nesanāk slidot, komanda rod risinājumu uz riteņiem!

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un suņi atrod vectēva Grants laimīgi boulinga bumbu. Diemžēl Celtnieklīcī nav boulinga zāles... līdz šim! Kad pēkšņa superziedēšana sagūsta Motori, Liliju un Parka Reindžeri Rozu, suņiem jārod ziediem draudzīgs risinājums.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Džūdija burtiski pazaudē zobu. Vai to atradīs pirms likšanās uz auss, un vai zobu fejai garšos marmelāde? Padingtons kļūst par darba lāci un palīdz Brauna kungam mājas birojā, bet uzzina, ka datori mēdz niķoties.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Brauniem ir jauni kaimiņi, un Toka stāsta, ka dārzā ir goblins, un viņas tētis ir astronauts! Tā taču nav tiesa, vai ne? Padingtons, Džonatans un Džūdija nolēmuši veidot avīzi, bet viņiem vajag stāstu titullapai!

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Grūbera kungs izdara labu Padingtonam un saka, ka viņš var pateikties, izdarot labu kādam citam. Tas ir grūtāk nekā izklausās! Padingtons uzzina par kompostēšanu, pateicoties Mulča kungam. Vai viņš paspēs izaudzēt puķes tantei Lūsijai?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons mācās par bitēm un nolemj palīdzēt tām ražot medu, iestādot puķes, bet kāds domā, ka tās ir nezāles! Vindzoras dārzos ir karstuma vilnis, Mateo izpārdevis visus saldējumus, tāpēc viņš kopā ar Padingtonu rada jaunu garšu!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pasaules krāsainākās ģimenes atgriešanās! Barbapapas - lielā ģimene! Barbapapu dzīvē nav rutīnas. Katra diena ir pārsteigumu un piedzīvojumu pilna!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni apņēmas sarīkot izcilu šovu! Barbaliba grib uztaisīt vislabāko limonādi.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pirmoreiz bērni brauks ar vilcienu un pavadīs nakti viesnīcā. Barbabo rada lielisku sniegavīru.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni pielipuši pie televizora, tāpēc vecāki mudina viņus veidot raidījumus.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri

programme.desc: Vectēvs aizved Pepu un Džordžu uz rotaļlaukumu, bet nesaprot bērnu noteikumus.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Zivs Goldija nešķiet laimīga, viņa neēd savu ēdienu, tāpēc Pepa, Džordžs un mamma aizved viņu pie veterināra daktera Kāmja.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Ģimene dodas uz atrakciju parku, bet mamma dusmojas, kad cilvēki pasaka, ka viņa nevarēs laimēt balvas. Džordžs bēdājas, ka minigolfa laukums viņam ir par lielu.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa ar draugiem mācās skaitīt, spēlējot spēles Gazeles jaunkundzes centrā.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa kopā ar ģimeni cenšas tikt uz rotaļlaukumu, bet uz ceļa tiek veikts remonts.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa ar draugiem spēlē paslēpes, bet lapsa Fredijs ar savu ožu ir labākais šajā spēlē.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa mācās svilpot, kad saprot, ka to prot visi, tikai ne viņa.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa ar draugiem un ģimeni gaida braucienu uz pludmali, kur viņi varēs būvēt smilšu pilis, bet, kad viņi ierodas pludmalē, tur ir daudz sniega!

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Jauni piedzīvojumi ar DORU! Pievienojies drošajai pasaules pētītājai Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu kopīgajos ceļojumos pa maģisko lietusmežu, kurā var notikt - un notiek - brīnumu lietas. Lets go!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni pielipuši pie televizora, tāpēc vecāki mudina viņus veidot raidījumus. Barbapapas apmeklē evolūcijas muzeju. Programmā: Zemes radīšana, Pirmskembrija perioda zemūdene un... dinozauri!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabella pavada nemierīgu nakti kukaiņu dēļ.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora un Zābaciņš lūdz jauno lietus mākonīti Klaudiju piepildīt izžuvušu ūdens slidkalniņu. Zābaciņam piemetas astiņkute, kuru var izārstēt burvju vardīte - ja vien nopelnīs savas burvju svītras, palīdzot draugiem lietusmežā.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un suņi atrod vectēva Grants laimīgi boulinga bumbu. Diemžēl Celtnieklīcī nav boulinga zāles... līdz šim! Kad pēkšņa superziedēšana sagūsta Motori, Liliju un Parka Reindžeri Rozu, suņiem jārod ziediem draudzīgs risinājums.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dorai, Zābaciņam un Benijam jādodas cauri lietusmežam, lai nogādātu Benija vecmammai lielu, skaistu piena kūku. Dora palīdz Fiestas trio noskaidrot, kas rada skaļo, savādo troksni, kura dēļ viņi pazaudējuši savus instrumentus.

programme.title: Barbapapa

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Mēre Greitveja un Dakija Dū kungs vēlas nodemonstrēt savas izpletņlēkšanas prasmes. Taču, kad patraucē vējš, suņi palīdz viņiem lēkt ar izpletni uz zemes! Kad Vīleram un cūkai Trifelei nesanāk slidot, komanda rod risinājumu uz riteņiem!

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Lielais Sarkanais Cālis nejauši sarucina Doru un Zābaciņu, tāpēc Doras brālītim un māsiņai jāpalīdz viņiem atkal kļūt lieliem. Dora glābj draugus no Benija gaisa balona, lai visi varētu doties uz svinībām Karalienes pilī.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabravo un Barbalala kļūst par maziem dumpiniekiem. Bet kas ir Barbatētis?

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Katram bērnam ir jādemonstrē savs talants. Videospēles ir jautras, bet jāizbauda labi laikapstākļi!

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons atver Vindzoru dārzu pirmo dzīvnieku viesnīcu, kad pie viņa apmetas Lakijs. Bāzs parkā izveidojis minigolfu, bet vai tas ir tiešām neuzveicams, kā viņš apgalvo? Kā lai Padingtons notur nūju?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons kopā ar bērniem dzird Brauna kunga plānu pārdot māju. Vai viņiem būs jāpamet Vindzoru dārzi? Bērni spēlējas dārzā un atrod ko asu. Kaut kas nav kārtībā, tāpēc Padingtons lūdz Bāza palīdzību.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad stirnai Podziņai jāšķērso Celtnieklīča lidostas skrejceļš, Rabls un komanda zina, kas jābūvē. Rabls un komanda uzbūvē milzu skrituļdēli tantes Celtnes un Rivera šovam. Taču, kad tas zaudē kontroli, suņiem jādzenas pakaļ!

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīcim vajadzīga pasta nodaļa! Bet, kad celtni apsēž vāveres, suņiem jāizdomā risinājums. Rabla komanda izmanto savas būvniecības prasmes, lai pārveidotu super auto mazgātavu un nomazgātu fermeres Zojas sušķīgos dzīvniekus.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Karija kungs grib kļūt par līderi un izveidot dabas klubu, lai atstātu iespaidu uz Potsa kundzi. Vai viņa fakti ir pareizi? Padingtons nokrīt un zaudē savu rāpšanās pašapziņu. Bez rāpšanās viņš nejūtas kā savā ādā - ko viņš var darīt?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Džonatans ar Padingtonu ezerā atrod dārgumu karti! Arī Džūdija un Toks tādu atrod. Kuri atradīs dārgumus pirmie? Grūbera kungs vienmēr gribējis doties uz Itāliju, Padingtons apņēmies palīdzēt piepildīt drauga sapni.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Karija kunga un Padingtona mīļākais radio raidījums tiek atcelts - kā viņi zinās, kā tas beidzas? Karija kungs uz dienu kļūst par Padingtona sulaini - bet viņam labāk padodas komandēt, nekā klausīt.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Notiek Vindzoru dārzu dzīvnieku izstāde, Padingtons ir tiesnesis. Visi ir tik talantīgi, kā viņam izvēlēties? / Padingtons, Džūdija un Džonatans atklāj, ka spēlēties ar kaimiņiem ir jautrāk, nekā censties pārspēt, kaut arī Toks zog idejas!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis stāsta bērniem par piedzīvojumu ar vilku. Rīt būs barbabērnu pirmā skolas diena.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis un Barbamamma atgriežas pie koka, zem kura piedzima. Tas ir sliktā stāvoklī. Viņiem tas steidzami jāglābj. Ir Barbamazuļu dzimšanas diena. Viņi katrs grib kaut ko citādu.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais uztvēris melodiju no Marsa. Barbapapas būvē raķeti, lai dotos uz sarkano planētu. Ceļā uz Marsu Barbapapas sastop Barbamarsiešu ģimeni. Viņiem nav laika iepazīties, kad ciemam uzbrūk milzu augs.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbapapas apmeklē evolūcijas muzeju. Programmā: Zemes radīšana, Pirmskembrija perioda zemūdene un... dinozauri!

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: During a visit from Antony, Hazels wish lands them inside "Rattleconda Racers," a board game they invented. Once in the game, however, they bicker about the best way to play. Hazel wants to stick to the rules they used to play by, but Antony wants to make new ones. When the formidable Rhonda the Rattleconda takes off with Cosmo and Wanda, intending to make them her next meal, Hazel and Antony must confront the tension in their relationship to save them and escape the game! // When Hazel must give a presentation on what she wants to be when she grows up, she is excited to share her dreams of being a geologist! Wanting to wow her classmates, she wishes she could excavate an "out of this world" rock to show them. Cosmo and Wanda poof her underground to find a super special rock, and she does! But in the process, she angers a group of rock monsters and must use her knowledge of geology to win them over, get her rock back, and escape the cave!

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Its picture day at school! And on top of that, theyre serving the most delicious pudding at lunchtime! Only problem is, Dev has control of the pudding supply and is hoarding it. Hazel takes the power back by wishing that everyone had an unlimited supply of pudding. Pudding is everywhere and Dev is out of business! But things take a turn when people cant stop eating it and turn into pudding zombies. Now Hazel not only has to save picture day, but also stop a pudding apocalypse!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Peyos beloved characters are careening back on TV in a brand new, high-voltage, 3D version of this perennial favorite. Using pure Smurf DNA from the comic books, this new series aimed at girls and boys will push the charm and absurdity of the original to greater heights, fitting in perfectly with todays faster-paced times. Were going to present original stories with more complex characters, snappier dialogues, joyful anarchy, and irresistible global appeal for a contemporary audience aged 5 to 10. It will be an explosive box of adventure and humor!

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.desc: After getting rid of Ouchie, Pinkeye takes over the Star house in Get Ouch, and in Day of the Living Dad Jokes, Patrick and Squidina must find safety amidst the dad joke apocalypse. (Audio Described)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Still eager to impress Captain Perfect, Max volunteers to help him with his younger sister, a headstrong girl who seems to drawn to evil. Max tries to show her the benefits of being good, but she tricks him and heads to auditions for new Mastermind henchmen. Max disguises himself and goes the auditions, too, hoping to stop her from working for a supervillain. Both he and the young girl are chosen to prove their evil and destroy Splat by Sea, but Max reveals his identity to her and talks her out of being a villain just before the restaurant is ruined. Meanwhile, Phoebe convinces BC he needs an elaborate dance-posal to ask Chloe to the school dance, but her interference does more harm than good.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. When trouble oozes into the streets of New York City, the team finds themselves up against Mechazoids, street gangs, and even the storm of the century! No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: Jack and Lily are half-siblings living on opposite ends of the world both hoping to have the "best summer ever." When dangerous events forces Jacks mom to send him to live with his dad, the kids fear their summer dreams have become a nightmare.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Its Kindness Day! Mr. Guzman announces that if all students complete one act of kindness, theyll get a class pizza party-and Hazel wants that pizza! But when Dev refuses to participate, Cosmo and Wanda call on the Pe-Az, a trio of alien diplomats, to reason with him. Despite their best efforts, Dev outsmarts the Pe-Az and uses their alien technology to get rid of all the pizza on Earth. // Hazel must take matters into her own hands to get to the bottom of Devs surly attitude and save pizza! When Hazel makes a wish to understand why Dev acts the way he does, she gets paired with him for a class scavenger hunt. They struggle to work together, but, as the day goes on, they develop a friendship. However, that falls apart when Devs dad, Dale, belittles their effort, causing Dev to turn on Hazel again to save face. Will Dev be able to overcome his pride and finish the project, or will his issues with his dad tank both their grades?

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: When Hazel wishes to be 13 so that she can go see a PG-13 movie by herself, Cosmo and Wanda turn her into a teenager. They go the mall and have a blast doing "teenage things" while they wait for the movie. But, as a side effect of her wish, Hazel starts going through the fairy version of puberty: pasta puberty! As she struggles to deal with pesto pimples and mozzarella mood swings, Hazel wishes that Cosmo and Wanda would just get lost! They disappear, leaving Hazel to deal with the zany pasta puberty alone. // Hazel wishes to be a fairy to join Cosmo and Wanda at their Fairy Convention, but since its against Da Rules, she settles on looking like a fairy instead. Once at the con, however, Hazel stumbles into the DMV booth and signs a "Fairy-fication" certificate, turning her into a real fairy! It also brings her anti-fairy into existence, who steals the certificate. Hazel, Cosmo, and Wanda must get the certificate back from her anti-fairy, or Hazel will be stuck as a fairy forever!

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: On a fairy family trip to Fairy World, Dev convinces Hazel to steal Peris wand and explore Fairy World. Cosmo, Wanda and Peri sneak into Jorgens office and use his tracker to find them. Hazel and Dev end up stuck in the Un-Wish Zone, trapped by the Un-wish Dragon. Together they must battle the dragon and find their way back to their fairies before Jorgen finds out! // When band and orchestra tryouts happen at school, Hazel finds herself stuck in the middle of a rivalry between the two. Rather than choose a side, she wishes to be good at all instruments and ends up in both. Exhausted from the double life shes living, she wishes that the band and orchestra had nothing to be rivals about. In granting the wish, Cosmo and Wanda get rid of all music on Earth. Hazel, with the help of the Nmusic Phairy (silent N), must restore music to Earth and end this rivalry once and for all!

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: After Hazel makes her one-millionth wish, Cosmo and Wanda promise her one rule-free wish as a reward. But when their magic doesnt work, they take a trip to Fairy World to investigate and discover Dev has taken control. Fed up with living in Hazels shadow, hes teamed up with Irep to give control of the Big Wand to anti-fairies and now kids all over the world have the opportunity to grant wishes rule-free. Before Hazel, Cosmo, and Wanda can stop Dev, he traps Cosmo and Wanda in butterfly net cages and sends Hazel back home without her fairies to help her. While in power, Dev changes Fairy World to his own image and liking, and even reveals the existence of magic to everyone on Earth. Its total chaos. With the fate of Fairy World on her shoulders, Hazel enlists the help of Jasmine, Winn, Antony, and a few magical friends from past wishes, to rise up against Dev and his anti-fairy forces. Hazel must save Cosmo, Wanda, Peri, and Fairy World, before making a very special rule-free wish.

Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Chloe has been absent from school while on missions with her siblings, and is assigned summer school to make up her missing work. Max thinks its hilarious that she will have to spend the summer in school, until he is also informed that he will be the teacher. While they both pout about having to be in class all summer, Phoebe goes solo on some superhero mission. When a couple villains get the upper hand, a mysterious new superhero names Captain Perfect arrives to rescue her. Phoebe discovers that she and Captain Perfect have many of the same interests, and make a good crime-fighting team. As Phoebe wonders if she might have a new partner, Captain Perfect privately lets a contact know that he has earned Phoebes trust and is ready for the next phase of his assignment.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Dev is bummed at his own birthday party because his dad is off working. Hazel tries to cheer him up by wishing for a pair of rocket boots for him. He is stoked! Then, a party princess arrives, but this is no ordinary party princess, its VICKY from the original series. Meanwhile, Cosmo, Wanda, and Peri stumble into a secret room, where they discover that Dale has been investigating Hazel since Founders Day. Back at the party, Vicky, rotten as ever, forces the kids to make crafts for her online store instead of having fun. Hazel comes up with a plan full of zany traps to stop Vicky and take the party back! When Dev discovers his dad has been researching Hazel instead of spending time with him, Dev lashes out at Hazel and wishes Peri away. Left alone with his anger, is there a devious plan hatching in Devs mind?

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hoping to win "Most Spirited Hair" for School Spirit Week, Hazel wishes her hair had spirit! Cosmo and Wanda take this literally and give her hair a spirit, bringing it to life as Diana the Diva! When Hazel and Diana "butt heads" over how best to showcase her, Diana runs away. Hazel chases her all over town but cant catch her. Later, Diana shows up at Hazels school aiming to enter the contest on her own. Hazel must find a way to reconcile with Diana if she hopes to win Diana back and win the contest."

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Brainy and Lily are in the forest looking for some ingredients for Papa Smurf when Gargamel captures and locks them up. Shortly after, Gargamels mother comes by to ask him to look after his nephews. After one of their naughty pranks, Gargamel confiscates Dwayne and Rowenas toys, so to get even, the nephews decide to free the Smurfs. Upset, Gargamel takes his nephews to the ogre so only Brainy and Lily can save the children! // The Smurfs ask for Handys help to repair their belongings, but Handy always wants to do too much, adding options that are defective. The only one who manages to help the Smurfs is Diaper Daddy. Jealous of Diaper Daddys repair abilities and the fact that the Smurfs no longer ask for his help, Handy crafts himself an overpowered exoskeleton to improve his speed but Diaper Daddy remains the Smurfs favorite... Handy accidentally breaks his invention in anger and puts himself in danger. He must rely on Diaper Daddy to get him out of trouble!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Peyos beloved characters are careening back on TV in a brand new, high-voltage, 3D version of this perennial favorite. Using pure Smurf DNA from the comic books, this new series aimed at girls and boys will push the charm and absurdity of the original to greater heights, fitting in perfectly with todays faster-paced times. Were going to present original stories with more complex characters, snappier dialogues, joyful anarchy, and irresistible global appeal for a contemporary audience aged 5 to 10. It will be an explosive box of adventure and humor!

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel, Jasmine, and Winn take an online BFF compatibility test. To their surprise, they fail! Nobody is fazed, except for Hazel, who overthinks the results and wishes that her friends could know exactly whats in her head. Cosmo and Wanda grant the wish, which lands all of them inside Hazels mind. As they go through her mind like a museum, Hazel continues to overthink everything they see. Now, Hazel must overcome her negative thoughts and battle a literal mind worm to get her friends out! // When Hazel wishes she didnt have a gap in her teeth, the Tooth Fairy fills her gap with a talking tooth, Toothica. At first, she seems like a lot of fun, but when Toothica gets Hazel in trouble with her parents and plans a party in Hazels mouth Hazel isnt invited to, Hazel decides she wants her gone! The Tooth Fairy, however, takes Toothicas side and is even set on honoring her at a gala. Hazel must find a way to prove Toothica is no good and get back her gap or be stuck with this rotten tooth forever.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: After Hazel makes her one-millionth wish, Cosmo and Wanda promise her one rule-free wish as a reward. But when their magic doesnt work, they take a trip to Fairy World to investigate and discover Dev has taken control. Fed up with living in Hazels shadow, hes teamed up with Irep to give control of the Big Wand to anti-fairies and now kids all over the world have the opportunity to grant wishes rule-free. Before Hazel, Cosmo, and Wanda can stop Dev, he traps Cosmo and Wanda in butterfly net cages and sends Hazel back home without her fairies to help her. While in power, Dev changes Fairy World to his own image and liking, and even reveals the existence of magic to everyone on Earth. Its total chaos. With the fate of Fairy World on her shoulders, Hazel enlists the help of Jasmine, Winn, Antony, and a few magical friends from past wishes, to rise up against Dev and his anti-fairy forces. Hazel must save Cosmo, Wanda, Peri, and Fairy World, before making a very special rule-free wish.
